summary: 3D scene/game featuring Puro; touching Puro teleports the player to the hive (a generated 3D "white latex forest" inspired by Changed by DragonSnow).
architectural_notes: Project is a 3D scene/game with player collision/touch triggers.
The hive destination is a generated 3D "white latex forest" environment.

existing_features.title: Add a new 3D scene representing “the hive”: a generated 3D “white latex forest” environment inspired by the *Changed* (DragonSnow) white latex forest, using only original/procedurally generated geometry/materials (no copyrighted assets).

Implement player teleport-on-touch with Puro: when the player avatar collides/enters proximity with the existing Puro 3D model, transition gameplay from the library scene to the hive (white latex forest) scene and place the player at a defined spawn point in the hive.

Replace the current “touch Puro unlocks admin mode” proximity secret in `frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx` with the new teleport-to-hive behavior (so touching Puro teleports instead of unlocking admin mode). Any user-facing feedback text related to teleport must be in English.

new_feature_requests.summary: Teleport player to the hive (white latex forest) when touching/colliding with Puro 3D model
Generate/build a 3D version of the hive: the white latex forest (inspired by Changed by DragonSnow)

projectName: Teleport to generated 3D White Latex Forest (“the hive”) when touching Puro
